mapper.select: SELECT s.sale_date AS 'saleDate', s.user_id AS 'userId', s.s_no AS 'saleNo', s.p_no AS 'productNo', p.product_name AS 'productName', s.size AS 'size', s.sale_tracking_no AS 'saleTrackingNo', s.sale_state AS 'saleState', s.address AS 'address' FROM Sales s JOIN Product p ON s.p_no = p.p_no WHERE s.s_no = #{saleNo}
